---
title: "git_ssh_auth_invalid_private_key_both.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines storage settings for a Git repository using SSH authentication. It specifies both a private key path and private key bytes, which is an invalid configuration as only one should be provided.

## Symbols

### `storage`
#### Description
The root configuration block for storage settings.

#### Internal Logic
Defines the storage type as "git" and provides Git-specific configuration.

### `storage.type`
#### Description
Specifies the type of storage being configured.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| type | string | The storage type, set to "git" |

### `storage.git`
#### Description
Contains Git-specific configuration settings.

#### Internal Logic
Defines the repository URL and authentication details for SSH access.

### `storage.git.repository`
#### Description
Specifies the Git repository URL.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| repository | string | The SSH URL of the Git repository |

### `storage.git.authentication`
#### Description
Defines the authentication method and credentials for accessing the Git repository.

#### Internal Logic
Specifies SSH as the authentication method and provides necessary SSH credentials.

### `storage.git.authentication.ssh`
#### Description
Contains SSH-specific authentication details.

#### Internal Logic
Defines the SSH user, password, private key path, and private key bytes.

### `storage.git.authentication.ssh.user`
#### Description
Specifies the SSH username for authentication.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| user | string | The SSH username |

### `storage.git.authentication.ssh.password`
#### Description
Specifies the SSH password for authentication.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| password | string | The SSH password |

### `storage.git.authentication.ssh.private_key_path`
#### Description
Specifies the file path to the SSH private key.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| private_key_path | string | The file path to the SSH private key |

### `storage.git.authentication.ssh.private_key_bytes`
#### Description
Specifies the SSH private key data directly in the configuration.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| private_key_bytes | string | The SSH private key data |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| storage.type | string | N/A | The type of storage, set to "git" |
| storage.git.repository | string | N/A | The SSH URL of the Git repository |
| storage.git.authentication.ssh.user | string | N/A | The SSH username for authentication |
| storage.git.authentication.ssh.password | string | N/A | The SSH password for authentication |
| storage.git.authentication.ssh.private_key_path | string | N/A | The file path to the SSH private key |
| storage.git.authentication.ssh.private_key_bytes | string | N/A | The SSH private key data |

## Error Handling
This configuration file contains an invalid setup for SSH authentication. It specifies both `private_key_path` and `private_key_bytes`, which is typically not allowed as only one method of providing the private key should be used. This may lead to errors or unexpected behavior when the configuration is processed.
